=== I KILLED MOMMY ===

--- GuitarTabs.cc Version ---
Source: GuitarTabs.cc
Artist: Dayglo Abortions
Album: Out of the Womb (1981)
Tuning: Standard (E-A-D-G-B-E)

Song Structure:
- Intro: G and D string-based power chords
- Verse: Repetitive 7-7-7-7 chord patterns  
- Pre-Chorus: 4-4-4-4 and 7-7-7-7 progressions
- Chorus: Dynamic chord movements
- Behind Solo
- Outro

Note: Uses standard tuning with power chords and palm muting techniques.
Rhythmic, punk-style guitar work with repeating chord progressions.
